subject: Mental Health
title: The Anxiety Epidemic
description: A quick win: understand The Anxiety Epidemic.

hook.text: Anxiety disorder rates have surged over 25 percent in the last two decades.

buildup.text: Researchers point to information overload, economic instability, and isolation.

discovery.text: The WHO calls anxiety disorders the most common mental illness on the planet.

twist.text: Despite rising rates, most people with anxiety still receive no treatment.

climax.text: Stigma around mental health keeps millions suffering in silence.

punchline.text: An epidemic nobody sees is still an epidemic.

quiz.question: What does the WHO rank anxiety disorders as globally?
